Scorching Fangs.Elite 1: Whenever Wulfgard applies Combustion, he gains Scorching Fangs for 10s. This effect cannot stack. Scorching Fangs: While active, Wulfgard gains Heat DMG Dealt +20%.
Scorching Fangs.Elite 2: Whenever Wulfgard applies Combustion, he gains Scorching Fangs for 10s. This effect cannot stack. Scorching Fangs: While active, Wulfgard gains Heat DMG Dealt +30%.

Code of Restraint.Elite 2: Whenever the battle skill Thermite Tracers successfully consumes an Arts Reaction, return 5 SP.
Code of Restraint.Elite 3: Whenever the battle skill Thermite Tracers successfully consumes an Arts Reaction, return 10 SP.

Pack Techniques.Elite 1: Assign to Manufacturing Cabin to grant operator EXP material production efficiency +10%
Pack Techniques.Elite 3: Assign to Manufacturing Cabin to grant operator EXP material production efficiency +20%

Knack for the Wildlands.Elite 2: Assign to Growth Chamber to grant rare mineral growth rate +20%
Knack for the Wildlands.Elite 4: Assign to Growth Chamber to grant rare mineral growth rate +30%
